alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 27 at 2:31AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kentucky, including the following counties, Elliott and Rowan. * WHEN...Until 530 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 230 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen over much of the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elliottville, Vale, Wagner Store, Wagner, Minor, Hamm, Farley, Fannin Valley, Haldeman, Christy and Gates.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
